title: A censure upon Lilly's Grammar wherein, besides a discourse on the reason of education, are shewn : the contradictions, falsities and false words, omissions, repetitions, superfluous rules, and misplaced words in our grammar / by R.G., formerly of the Free-School in New-Castle.
author: R. G. (Richard Gower)
publicationStmtPublisher: Printed by B.W. for George Downs ...,
